text: <@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F5QEGF00Z/one_item_i_m_trying_to_query_for.js|One item I'm trying to query for>
So here is my item|pprint -- and 4 is category
category is a select.  Is there a way to actually do a query on the category by the name and not numbers?

{% set category = 'Support Videos for Fleets' %}
    {% set support_items = hubdb_table_rows(hubdb_table_id, "&category="~category_picked) %}
also doesn't work if if urlencode the category string
if it is set category or category_picked (sorry for the typo)

<@U25PYL3Q8|nickdeckerdevs> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/nickdeckerdevs/F5R03621Z/this_causes_me_to_get_the_category_id_so_i_can_query_for_it.m|This causes me to get the category id so I can query for it>
gotta set it to an int
Wow. So I'm glad I've finally found a way to programmatically get these things displayed instead of manually doing ID numbers for everything
